events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund because it doesn't fit as expected.
The system has identified this inquiry as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning 'refund' and 'request'.
Agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case for the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide the order number and let us know if the product has been opened or used in any way?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket is new and unopened, I just tried it on for size but haven’t worn it outside.
Thank you for the details. We can process your refund once you send the jacket back. We will send a prepaid return label for you.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid label option—that makes returning it much easier for me.
The return label has been emailed to you. Please use it to ship the jacket back, and once received, we will issue your refund promptly.
Just checking in! Have you been able to send the jacket back? Let us know if you need any assistance with the return process.
Yes, I dropped off the package yesterday. The courier confirmed it’s on the way to your warehouse.
We’ve received the jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Your refund request has been successfully completed. We are closing this case now, and we hope to serve you again in the future.
